org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.forms.fields

Class FormFieldFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.forms.fields.FormFieldFactory

  • public class FormFieldFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A center for the whole application to create fields that are inteded to be used in forms, especially CustomFormLayout.
    Author:
    SkyCrawl
